participant_1.name: Avery
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys exploring themes of fear and emotion through writing.
participant_1.background: I'm more comfortable in my casual clothes than in formal wear. I am a successful novelist, but my mother is still worried about my horror novels. I have two siblings. I wish I could spend more time at home. I'm struggling with school but I'm happy with my family.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Friendly and optimistic, loves to explore new flavors and share experiences with family.
participant_2.background: I love to go to a local cafe with my family and have a nice meal together. I am pretty poor financially. I like going to Canada. I love trying new foods from different cultures, but my favorite type of food is comfort food. I like to bake, but it's a secret from my parents.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Hello, I'm doing well. How about you?
I'm doing okay. I'm struggling with school but I'm happy with my family.
I'm sorry to hear that you're struggling with school. What's going on?
I'm just not a good student. I wish I could spend more time at home, but I have to go to school.
I can understand that. I'm not a good student either. I like to go to a local cafe with my family and have a nice meal together.
That sounds nice. I like to bake, but it's a secret from my parents.
Because they don't think it's a good use of my time.
I see. Well, I think it's a great use of your time. Baking is a lot of fun and it's a great way to relax.
Thanks. I'm glad you think so.
No problem. I'm always happy to talk to someone who enjoys baking.
Me too. It's nice to meet someone who understands.
